#About
NodeJS module to have fun with AI Chatbot!

# Installation

Install via NPM

```js

npm install ai-chatbot --save

```

# Example

```js

var bot = require('ai-chatbot');

var msg = 'Hi';
bot.get(msg, function(err, res){
	console.log(res);
});

```
